title: Thanatos - Remastered (2012-14) Black Disc Collector Items quali
description:
5 Albums:

(1990) Emerging From The Netherworlds (Remastered 2012)
(1992) Realm Of Ecstacy (Remastered 2012)
(2000) Angelic Encounters (Remastered 2013)
(2004) Undead. Unholy. Divine. (Remastered 2014)
(2009) Justified Genocide (Remastered 2014)


Source: CD-rip (EAC LAME 3.93) (Scans included)

Format: 320 CBR / MP3

Genre(s): Death/Thrash Metal

Country: The Netherlands


Current Line-Up:

-Marco de Bruin: Bass
-Paul Baayens (Hail of Bullets, Asphyx): Guitars
-Stephan GebÃƒÂ©di (Hail of Bullets): Guitars/Vocals
(and indeed... no drummer at the moment?!)


Band Description:

Thanatos......an illustrious name that has been haunting the Underground Metal scene since 1984...
After several demo tapes and line-up changes, Thanatos released two classic Thrash/Death Metal albums in the early 1990's:
'Emerging From The Netherworlds' and 'Realm Of Ecstasy'. The band shared the stage with the likes of Kreator, Sepultura,
Death, Napalm Death, Bolt Thrower, Autopsy and Death Angel to name but a few.

In 1992 Thanatos split up due to a variety of reasons but was revived in 1999 by founding member Stephan GebÃƒÂ©di,
featuring a new line-up that included members from Sinister, Houwitser and Cremation.
The third Thanatos album, 'Angelic Encounters', was released in 2000 followed by more shows with bands like Morbid Angel,
Vader, Dying Fetus, Exhumed, Cryptopsy, Krisiun, Destruction and Necrophagia.
Despite great reviews the band was not totally satisfied with this album. Two more personnel changes followed.

In 2002 the band recorded four new songs and two covers in a small 8-track studio to attract some interest from record companies.
Baphomet Records/Red Stream released these recordings as the 'Beyond Terror' Mini CD.
Thanatos signed a recording deal with Greek label Black Lotus Records in 2003, resulting in the release of 'Undead.Unholy.Divine.'
the next year. Whilst recording their fifth full-length album Ã¢â‚¬ËœJustified GenocideÃ¢â‚¬â„¢,
the band was informed of Black Lotus RecordsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ bankruptcy and the album was put on hold.

In 2007 Band members Paul and Stephan joined forces in Hail of Bullets.
Paul also joined the reformed Asphyx and Yuri joined Melechesh.

In 2009, a quarter of a century after the band's first incarnation, Ã¢â‚¬ËœJustified Genocide' was finally released by Deity Down Records.
The album features the band's strongest songs so far. Their typical mix of old school thrash and death metal still stands tall
and these are the band's most raw and in your face sounding recordings ever.
'Justified Genocide' was recorded at Excess Studio in Rotterdam, Netherlands and mixed and mastered by
Dan SwanÃƒÂ¶ (Edge Of Sanity, Bloodbath, Moontower) at Unisound Studio in Sweden.

In 2012 Thanatos signed a deal with the mighty Century Media Records to re-issue their complete back catalogue.
Ã¢â‚¬ËœEmerging from the NetherworldsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ and Ã¢â‚¬ËœRealm Of EcstasyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ were re-released in September 2012 as both Cd and multi-coloured vinyl.
